PF - Prevented Fraction

To install or update PF:

From Github

From within R

  1. Installing last release
devtools::install_github("ABS-dev/PF", ref = "9.6.8")

See all historical releases here

  1. Installing work-in-progress on the main development branch
devtools::install_github("ABS-dev/PF")

For CVB employees

After setting up Rstudio to work with Package Manager, you can install the most recent version of PF like so:

install.package("PF")

You can install an archived version of PF thus:

devtools::install_version('PF', '0.5.0')

Refer to the PF overview on Package Manager to find a list of the archived versions.

Package Vignette:

Read online at https://www.aphis.usda.gov/animal_health/vet_biologics/publications/STATWI0007.pdf

Package Manual:

Read online at https://github.com/ABS-dev/PF/blob/master/inst/doc/PFPackageManual.pdf

Issues

Report any issues or requests on the package issues page.
